alert.note: Alert for Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Harrison and southern Jackson Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 845 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyman to 6 miles north of Petit Bois Island. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Moss Point, St. Martin, Escatawpa, Gautier, D`iberville, Latimer, Lyman, Helena, Gulf Hills, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates, Hickory Hills and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 25 and 76. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
